settings.title: Perfect Fit, Made to Last Guarantee
settings.content_html: We give a fit about comfort and quality, and want you to look good and feel good for years to come. That’s why every product comes with a Perfect Fit, Made to Last Guarantee – if it doesn’t fit right or wears a little too soon, let us know within 30 days and we’ll replace it for free, no questions asked.

settings.title: Care Guide
settings.content_html: We recommend washing on cold and laying flat to dry, or use a low temp dryer setting. Drying may result in about 5% shrinkage.

settings.title: Free Returns & Exchanges
settings.content_html: Start a return or get in touch with our team by contacting us at support@trueclassic.com or by calling our phone number at (323) 419-1092.

settings.text: It's NOT just a t-shirt. Our premium tees are designed for guys’ bodies. They accentuate the arms & shoulders to make you stand out and feel great. They're also super soft, wash well and reasonably priced.

settings.question: What are the features of a True Classic crew neck t-shirt?
settings.paragraph:
Answer Every guy looks great in classic crew necks. They flatter the arms, chest, and back. And if you pick the right shirt, it’ll last you a lifetime. Try our crews with pockets or without them. Also available in long sleeve crews.

All of our classic, slim fit crew neck tees are fitted and sized to flatter your body — no matter what shape or size. That’s because we know the difference between an ok shirt and a great shirt — it’s all in how a shirt sits on your arms and shoulders. Plus, we put a lot of work into making sure our shirts won’t shrink and your back won’t itch (our shirts are tagless). Our cotton crew neck t shirt are perfectly balanced with polyester for a slim fitted crew.

settings.question: Which crew necks are most popular?
settings.paragraph: Keep it simple with the essential white crew or black crew neck shirt. You can purchase crew 3 packs of the basics or our staple 6 pack of crews, so your wardrobe has a foundation to build on.

settings.question: How should a crew neck fit your body?
settings.paragraph: A crew neck should accentuate your upper body, primarily your arms and shoulders. It should fit snugly around your neck, but you shouldn’t feel constrained or choked. Use our Find My Fit calculator to find the best crew neck size.

settings.question: What should men avoid when buying a men's crew neck t-shirt?
settings.paragraph: One of our biggest pet peeves is gathering around the crew neck collar. When you sport a crew neck, it should lay flat along your chest. But if it gathers and doesn’t sit right around your collarbone … run for the hills.

settings.question: How do you style a men's crew neck t-shirt?
settings.paragraph: In warmer months, style your crew neck with slim-fit jeans for a night out on the town. And as it cools off, reach for your favorite fleece joggers and layer your crew neck under a quality hoodie.
